incidents.name: Unauthorized Sessions Will Encounter an Endless Spinner

incident_updates.body: Issue causing unauthorized sessions getting to an endless spinner has been resolved and Twilio's console is operating normally at this time.
Twilio's console is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue causing unauthorized sessions to get to an endless spinner and are working to deploy a fix. Current workaround is to manually navigate to www.twilio.com and then log in. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are seeing an issue with the Twilio's console where unauthorized sessions cause an endless spinner. Our engineering team is looking into the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio's console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Elevated Number of 5XX Errors on the Creation and Validation of Verifications

incident_updates.body: Twilio Verify’s creation and validation (check) endpoints were degraded for 7 minutes between September 5th, 2023 02:20 UTC to September 5th, 2023 02:27 UTC. During this period of time, customers may have experienced an increase in 5xx errors. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Active Numbers Page Fails to Fetch when Region IE1 is Active

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing issue with the active numbers console page for Region IE1. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery with the active numbers console page for Region IE1. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate errors seen in the console when using IE1 routing. The Active Numbers page may fail to load with an "Internal Server Error" or an "Oppose Something Went Wrong" error. incidents.name: Voice Recordings Throwing 500 Errors

incident_updates.body: From 2:22 PM PST to 2:32 PM PST on 29/08/2923 a subset of Twilio customers would have received 500s for starting, stopping, pausing, or resuming voice recordings. This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: WhatsApp Messages Delays

incident_updates.body: CloudAPI was degraded for 23 minutes between 08:15 and 08:38 Pacific Time on 08/29/2023. During this period of time, customers may have experienced delays when sending WhatsApp messages. The issue has now been resolved.
